job.name: TpcRS
job.command: source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile _ry2011_Tree_evout_BAna__1_999999O.MuDst.root` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}B.log set tree = ${file}.Tree.root set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then root4star -q -b 'bfc.C(4000,"MakeEvent,ITTF,NoSsdIt,NoSvtIt,Idst,VFMinuit,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,CMuDst,IdTruth,useInTracker,tpcDB,TpcFastSim,mtin,y2011,evout,TpcAligner","'${evtsFile}'",0,"'${tree}'")' > ${logFile} endif
